metadata.title: CVE-2025-21679 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:btrfs: add the missing error handling inside get_canonical_dev_pathInside function get_canonical_dev_path(), we call d_path() to get thefinal device path.But d_path() can return error, and in that case the next strscpy() callwill trigger an invalid memory access.Add back the missing error handling for d_path().

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
